action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with all cells empty except for the third row, which has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth cells.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with X symbols forming a border around the edges and a few X symbols scattered in the interior, creating a pattern with empty squares (▢) in between. The first and last rows are entirely X symbols. The second row has X symbols in the first two and last two positions. The third row has X symbols in the first, third, and last positions. The fourth row has X symbols in the first, fourth, and fifth positions. The fifth row is entirely X symbols.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with all cells empty except for the third row, which has Xs in the first, second, fourth, and fifth cells.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any X symbols in the first or last rows of your grid?
